title: The Chronicles of Conan, Volume 9: Riders of the River-Dragons and Other Stories
description: From the turbulent seas to the deepest, darkest jungles, the barbarian Conan moves ever closer to his destiny as king and conqueror. Allied with the deadly she-pirate Belit, Conan journeys further into the most savage and untamed Hyborian lands, and into his own heart of darkness. It's Sword and Sorcery at its finest!
author: Roy Thomas
